name: SleepShuffle
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep shuffle
des:
Sleep Shuffle helps you fall asleep without deep thinking. 

"Alexa, open sleep shuffle"

Then, this skill gives you comfortable music and random words. This method is derived from "Cognitive Shuffle" designed by Dr. Luc P. Beaudoin.

The comfortable music will be played for around 4 minutes and random words will be red for around 4 minutes by intervals of 5 seconds. Words are chosen from 150 words randomly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
